response_requirements.initial_response_description: Agency must determine whether to grant or deny request within 20 working days (excluding weekends and legal holidays)
extension_conditions: Need to search multiple separate and distinct facilities
Need for consultation with other agencies

fee_structure.standard_copy_fee: Reasonable standard charges for document duplication
fee_structure.electronic_fee: Cost of duplication in requested format
fee_structure.search_time_fee: Reasonable standard charges for search time beyond 2 hours
waiver_criteria: Disclosure is in the public interest
Disclosure contributes significantly to public understanding of government operations
Disclosure is not primarily in the commercial interest of requester

exemptions: Information specifically authorized under Executive Order to be kept secret in the interest of national defense or foreign policy
Information related solely to internal personnel rules and practices
Information specifically exempted from disclosure by statute
Trade secrets and commercial or financial information obtained from person and privileged or confidential
Inter-agency or intra-agency memorandums or letters which would not be available by law to party other than agency in litigation
Personnel and medical files and similar files the disclosure of which would constitute clearly unwarranted invasion of personal privacy
Records or information compiled for law enforcement purposes
Information contained in or related to examination, operating, or condition reports prepared by agencies responsible for regulation or supervision of financial institutions
Geological and geophysical information and data, including maps, concerning wells

requester_requirements.specific_format: Must reasonably describe records sought; written request preferred but not required

oversight_body.name: Office of Government Information Services (OGIS)
oversight_body.role: Provides mediation services for FOIA disputes and reviews agency compliance

primary_sources: Cornell Law School Legal Information Institute
U.S. Department of Justice Office of Information Policy
validation_metadata.verification_notes: Verified current text including 2016 FOIA Improvement Act amendments
